Text:
Thank you for uploading this.

Let's see how this looks :)

Using this film as reference material for a video project, I needed a high resolution version badly!

You just made my day, thank you! =)
thanks a lot for sharing this, looks fab :)

(1) are the subs SRT or SSA (soft subs), or are they burned in?

(2) can anyone provide the English audio dub track, so I can use MKVmerge to mux it in with the 720p MKV file?
